column4: good day, everybody! Please help newbie: i can't modify files in var directory in xserver, thanks!
if you need to edit files use    gksudo gedit /path/filename
it opened editor, but i can't see the content, it is completely blank. I am sure that it has some content, thanks!
are you sure you typed the correct path and file name   it is case sensitive.
use the menu in the editor to surf to the file.
it says access denied (i tried to open the file with text editor)
want to know the linux way ?       in a terminal "usdo -i "     then  "nano /var/pathtofile/file.name "    and edit the darn thing and be done with it.
how do i know if nautilus is installed or is it built in?
tab completion is a wonderful thing.
i found that nautilus in usr/lib
thanks, i'll restart the computer and see what happens
